docs.text: PJVG is a lean JSON-based vector graphics format with a focus on simplicity. Goals Document Structure Goals ¶ Easy to implement renderer from scratch Support software and hardware rendering Document Structure ¶ { "pjvg" : 0 , "extensions" : [], "content" : [ { "type" : "shape" , "segments" : [ { "type" : "lines" , "points" : [ [ 0 , 0 ], [ 0 , 100 ], [ 100 , 100 ], ] }, { "type" : "cubic-bezier" , "points" : [ [ 100 , 100 ], [ 100 , 0 ], [ 50 , 50 ], [ 0 , 0 ], ] } ], "fill" : { "type" : "solid" , "color" : { "type" : "srgb" , "value" : [ 0.752 , 0.432 , 0.192 ] } } } ] }
